Lallargh was firbolg crone who lived in the South Jotunhammer Mountains on the island of Norland in the Moonshae Isles in the .
Lallargh led the firbolgs and other giants who claimed the mountains. She believed that for her kind to survive they needed to sweep down from the mountains and crush Rogarsheim, allowing them to take the rest of Norland with ease. To further this goal Lallargh made pacts with duergar who lived beneath the mountains, as well as wicked mercenaries. All were promised a portion of the spoils after Rogersheim was sacked.
